title.narrative: 2012 Management Program - National Youth Services in Sub-Saharan Africa

description.narrative: For a research project to increase the knowledge base about National Youth Service (NYS) programs in Sub-Saharan Africa in order to provide more opportunities for development practitioners to better design and implement NYS programs that will enable African youth to access employment and entrepreneurial opportunities and improve their livelihoods. The project also enables NYS policy-makers to network, learn and innovate as well as opportunities for greater private sector and public engagement.
